newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: BHP says Tony Barnes to head power group.
newsitem.headline: BHP says Tony Barnes to head power group.

text.p: The Broken Hill Pty Co Ltd (BHP) said on Tuesday it had appointed Tony Barnes to the postiion of group general manager and president of BHP Power, effective May 1.
Barnes, who is currently group general manager of finance and administration at BHP Petroleum, will replace Dennis Loughridge.

BHP executive general manager service companies, Paul Jeans, said Barnes would provide strategic leadership for the BHP Power unit as it developed market opportunities for BHP's energy resources. -- Melbourne bureau 61-3 9286-1435
